column5: Had to cancel our trip to www.ontariohuntingfishing.com (Northwest Outfitters & Outpost Camps Ltd.) for personal reasons. It was an 11-day trip (beginning 6/24/18) at a lodge between Lake of the Woods and Shoal Lake. Call Don and see if he will apply our $1,000.00 deposit to your trip. He seems like a great guy, and it is a great area by all accounts. Tell him John sent you.
